resources.string:
Version:%s
 Firmware Version:%s
 Service Call:%s
 Machine Name:%s
 Installation Site:%s
Please input the grinder powder weight.

1. Open the door, remove the brewer.
2. Place a container under the grinder outlet. Press START.
3. Measure the sample powder.
4. Input the value, press OK to finish.

1. Open the door, remove the brewer.
2. Place a container under the coffee canister outlet. Press START.
3. Measure the sample powder.
4. Input the value, press OK to finish.

1. Open the door, remove the mixer.
2. Place a container under the instant canister outlet. Press START.
3. Measure the sample powder.
4. Input the value, press OK to finish.

1. Open the door, remove the mixer.
2. Place a container under the instant canister outlet. Press START.
3. Measure the sample powder.
4. Input the value, press OK to finish.

1. Open the door, remove the mixer.
2. Place a container under the instant canister outlet. Press START.
3. Measure the sample powder.
4. Input the value, press OK to finish.
1. Open the water tank lid. Measure the water temperature with a probe thermometer until water temperature remains stable for 30 seconds.\n2. The deviation should be within 5 degrees.

1. Close the door.
2. Place a container under the water outlet on the drip tray. Press START.
3. Measure the sample water.
4. Input the value, press OK to finish.

1. Close the door.
2. Place a container under the coffee outlet on the drip tray. Press START.
3. Measure the sample water.
4. Input the value, press OK to finish.

1. Close the door.
2. Place a container under the coffee outlet on the drip tray. Press START.
3. Measure the sample water.
4. Input the value, press OK to finish.

1. Close the door.
2. Place a container under the coffee outlet on the drip tray. Press START.
3. Measure the sample water.
4. Input the value, press OK to finish.

1. Open the door. Disconnect the hot water hose from the brewer.
2. Place a container under the hot water hose end. Press START.
3. Measure the sample water.
4. Input the value, press OK to finish.

1. Close the door.
2. Place a container under the water outlet on the drip tray. Press START.
3. Measure the sample water.
4. Input the value, press OK to finish.

1. Close the door.
2. Place a container under the water outlet on the drip tray. Press START.
3. Measure the sample water.
4. Input the value, press OK to finish.

1. Open the door, pour the brewer cleaning agent into the brewer then close and lock the door.\n2. Fully raise both drink outlets and place the cleaning container on the drip tray under both outlets.\n3. Press START.

1. Open the door, pour the brewer cleaning agent into the brewer then close and lock the door.\n2. Fully raise both drink outlets and place the cleaning container on the drip tray under both outlets.\n3. Press START.

1. Remove the brewer.
2. Remove the bean hopper and store the remaining beans.
3. Add the grinder cleaning tablets and replace the hopper into the machine.
4. Place a container under the grinder outlet to catch the tablet residue.
5. Press and hold PUSH to run the grinder until all tablet residue has been expelled. 
6. Refill the hopper with beans.
7. Press and hold PUSH until only clean coffee grounds come out.
Open the door, place a cleaning container under the coffee outlet.\nPress START to run the cleaning procedure.
Place a cleaning container on the drip tray.\nPress START to run the cleaning procedure.
Place a 3L cleaning container on the drip tray. \nPress START button to run the water filter flush.\nRecommended to flush 15L (5 cycles).
Empty and replace the cleaning container. \nPress CONTINUE to go on the flush procedure.\n Press ABORT to stop flushing.
Press OPEN to rotate the brewer to the open position or CLOSE to return it to the home position.
The drip tray is removed or incorrectly installed. Please remove and replace the drip tray.
The drip tray is full. Please remove, empty and replace it.
Please close the door and wait for the drink to finish!
The water is heating, please wait a moment.
Please wait for the water to finish heating.
An overcurrent condition was detected, restart the machine to clear the error. If the problem persists contact technical support for assistance.\n\n
A temperature sensor error was detected, restart the machine to clear the error. If the problem persists contact technical support for assistance.\n\n
Water filling is taking too long, please check the water supply and restart the machine to clear the error. If the problem persists contact technical support for assistance.\n\n
The water tank is filling, please wait a moment.
The waste bin is full, please open the door and empty and replace the waste bin. Then enter Canister Settings and reset the waste counter by pressing Empty Waste Bin.
To ensure a fresh and great tasting drink every time run the Daily Clean function now. Press OK to begin, it takes less than 1 minute.
To ensure a fresh and great tasting drink every time run the Weekly Clean function now. Press OK to begin, it only takes about 9 minutes.
The water is taking too long to heat up, please restart the machine to clear the error. If the problem persists contact technical support for assistance.\n\n
Are you sure you want to delete the selected ingredient?
Are you sure you want to clear all scheduled events?
Are you sure you want to reset the counters?
Only set the canister level after the canister has been filled to the desired volume.\n\nAre you sure you want to proceed?
"Always reset the waste counter after the waste bin has been emptied and replaced.\n\nAre you sure you want to reset?"
"Only reset the counter if you have replaced, cleaned or inspected the part according to the instructions in the EVO Technical Manual.\n\nAre you sure you want to reset?"
"Please clean or check the part according to the instructions in the EVO Technical Manual."
A water level sensor error was detected, please restart the machine to clear the error. If the problem persists contact technical support for assistance.\n\n
Please the check water filter and restart the machine, then run the Flush Water Filter function.
"All settings and recipes will be reset to factory defaults.\nAre you sure you want to proceed?"
IMPORTANT!\nIf you have refilled the coffee or ingredients, or emptied the waste bin, please be sure to reset the canister volume or clear the waste bin counter in the Canister Settings.
IMPORTANT!\nIf you have refilled the coffee or ingredients, please be sure to reset the canister volume in the Canister Settings.
IMPORTANT!\nIf you have emptied the waste bin, please be sure to clear the waste bin counter in the Canister Settings.
"Please restart the machine after you updated the software!"
Calibration value is out of bounds!
Please remove the service key to enter service menu.
Sharing the storage media with a PC can make it inaccessible
Are you sure to delete this picture!
Do you really want to use the machine without a filter?
Thank you for choosing a CQube EVO.\nThis guide will help you to configure your coffee machine.\nPlease select your language:
Please select the water hardness level:
Please select the type of water filter installed:
Note:If you choose premium filter,please do water filter flush in clean menu before using!
Your CQube EVO is now ready for use.\nPlease press finish to exit the setup wizard.\nYou can run the wizard anytime from the settings menu.
Start wizard when next power on
"All Log info will be reset.\nAre you sure you want to proceed?"
You must select at least 1 item!

1.Press the test button to see if the valve works correctly.

2.Select the test result.
1.According to the video,empty the water from tank. \n2.Press the Open button.\n3.Blow the air from XXXX.
